ygData.msgSnippet: Tarantulas, Klash, Black Aracnia, and Quickstrike abandon the plate idea. They return to the bridge and go over systems and defence. Quickstrike, Adrax,

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Tarantulas, Klash, Black Aracnia, and Quickstrike abandon the plate 
idea. They return to the bridge and go over systems and defence.
       "Quickstrike, Adrax, Bezerker, Pheniox, Jackle and Aerostreak come 
with me to the entry/exit ramp. We can blast the Destrons from that position 
from behinde the shields in safety. Besides, if they do manaage to get in the 
perimiter some how thay'll get blasted to slag by the defense systems before 
they make 3 feet. Arm your selfs."
       The Predacons, armed and ready, went to the ramp and began to blast 
the Destrons, as did the manule defense canons and autoguns. 
       Paddletail, Aquarious, Black Aracnia, Klash, and Tarantulas, kept 
vigil over the systems, sending worker drones to repair damage, and recycling 
needed power and resources.
       Craken and Nighteyes both went into CR Tanks to heal thier bloody 
wounds and to regain stabibility.
       
       Ominous Prime, as the other Energonians, targeted the Cybertronian 
Fire and pummled it with blast after blast of energon discharge.
 

--part1_72.8290381.27cae49c_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
